home.text_1: Zum goldenen Kalb is Munich's first and only New York steakhouse.
home.text_2: Here you can get the most authentic steaks in town directly across from the Schranne at Viktualienmarkt.
home.text_3: Give us a call or book your table online now.

book.text_1: Online reservations are only available for tables of up to 6 people.
book.text_2: For tables of 7 or more, please reserve by phone at
book.text_3: For times other than those suggested, please also inquire by phone. We allocate 2 and a half hours for your visit. Reservations after 8:00 PM are not time-limited.
book.text_5: Tuesday – Saturday from 5:00 PM to 1:00 AM. Saturdays from 12:00 PM.
book.text_6: We look forward to your visit.
book.text_7: Your team at The Golden Calf
book.text_8: You will be informed about the successful reservation via email.

menu.service_1: OUR SERVICE STAFF WILL ACCOMPANY YOU TO THE
menu.all: ALL STEAKS ALSO AVAILABLE AS SURF&TURF WITH WILD PRAWNS 23,00 EACH
menu.grill: All steaks are prepared on our HaJaTec charcoal grill
